hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Abu Huraira that the Messenger Allah (ﷺ) said:A disbeliever and a believer who killed him will never be gathered together in Hell

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَتَلَ كَافِرًا ثُمَّ سَدَّدَ
chapter.eng-name: One who kills a disbeliever then keeps to the right path
